RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE AT A MILE OR OVER SINCE JULY 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEBDURITE set the early pace, dueled on the lead from the half mile to deep stretch, edged clear late under strong handling. AUGER pressed the early speed, dueled from the half mile to deep stretch, was outfinished late but held place. ADANO had good position on the inside and finished willingly. QUESTION AUTHORITY tracked three wide and weakened in the stretch. GIZMO JONES raced mid on the inside and was no threat. ARAZI LIKE MOVE allowed to settle early, swung wide in the stretch and was no menace. SILVER G T O had good position for three quarters, then gave way. ENJOY BASEBALL broke in the air and trailed.

ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and finished willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVA POWER was hustled along and dueled on the lead from the rail, shook clear in the stretch and lasted late under left handed urging. RAINBOW SHIP had good position early, rallied four wide in the stretch, closed fast and just missed. CAT'S RHYTHM was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch between horse and finished well . CLIFTONS BALLERINA dueled with the winner and weakened slightly. CUT RATES raced wide and had no rally. DYNA'S HOLIDAY allowed to settle on the inside and was no menace. CARMEN OHIO was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOCTOR WU was unhurried early, rallied on the turn on the inside, angled out four wide in the stretch and quickly drew off while being ridden out. PRIVATE CONNIE was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch three wide and was up for place. TEMPLEMAN ALLEY dueled on the lead while between horses and weakened late. BAYOU SHACK dueled on the inside, shook clear in the stretch and faltered late. HURTS SO BAD dueled three wide and faded in the stretch. BIG BAD BEAST well placed early, gave way in the stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 16 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLD N SILVER was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was nicely rated on the front end, led throughout and widened late under a hand ride. UNBRIDLED CAUSE had good position on the inside throughout, could not gain on the winner late but was second best. KINGDOM DIAMOND was never far back, had a mild bid and went evenly late. INTO GOLD pressed the winner and weakened in the stretch. ROLLIN SO PERFECT was no menace. LINO'S KID contended early and gave way on the far turn.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANNFORD had good position early, rallied three wide in the stretch, closed determinedly and edged clear late. RONNI'S STORM dueled on the lead throughout, finished with good courage had held place. MIDNIGHT MIKEY dueled on the inside and held stubbornly after a long battle. HENRY THE CAT was allowed to settle, rallied late on the inside and closed a gap. DYNAMITE CLOUD saved ground early, angled out four wide and closed willingly. REANIMATEhad, good position early, angled out in the stretch and went evenly late. FOREIGN was no threat. PECKS NOT BAD had brief foot and gave way.

FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SARAH JANE dueled on the lead throughout, prevailed under strong handling. SWEET EMPIRE was never far back, rallied in the stretch and drew close, could not get past the winner but was clearly second best. BEEBLEGEE raced mid pack early, rallied three wide and had a mild bid. DIAL AGAIN raced wide throughout and went evenly. BEST OF YOU was off slowly and was no threat. CHECK OUT LINE close up early tired in the lane. ST PATTY'S SONG was outrun. HAPPY AS YOU GO pressed inside and gave way in the stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE COOKIE MAN was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and remained safe late while being ridden out. LE GENERAL had good position on the inside, finished willingly and was second best. RULING EMPIRE raced in the second flight, rallied four wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. NANO had good position on the inside and went evenly. TENTWELVEFOURTEEN allowed to settle, saved ground and was no threat. BOO BE RIGHT pressed the pace until mid stretch, then flattened out. CAPE MARCO DRIVE was outrun. GEMO tracked three wide, faded in the stretch and bled.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LARRY'S ANGEL dueled on the lead throughout, bore out late bumping with SAVESOMEFORME and prevailed. SAVESOMEFORME raced in the second flight and saved ground, rallied in the stretch, was bumped late by LARRYS ANGEL and just missed. SEEYOUINMOTOWN was allowed to settle on the inside, rallied in the stretch and finished well. BONNIE'S BEST dueled on the lead and weakened slightly late. PRONTO CHARLI raced close up throughout and went evenly late. NO MORE MARGS pressed the pace four wide and tired. TOTAL SMOKESHOW contended early and was through after a half. MY PINK BUNNY TALE raced mid pack, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. OHIO LADY was no factor. THELMA LUCILLE hopped start and was outrun. WICKED REESE had brief foot five wide and gave way.THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF SAVESOMEFORME CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF LARRYS ANGEL FOR INTERFERENCE IN LATE STRETCH. AFTER VIEWING THE TAPE THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED LARRYS ANGEL AND PLACED HER SECOND.
